# Healthcare Data Analysis

This project analyzes international healthcare facility data using R. It includes:
- Data cleaning and imputation
- Country-level KPIs
- Regression models predicting facility ratings and annual visits
- Visualizations for presentations

## Files
- `Healthcare_Data.csv`: Raw input data
- `country_kpis.csv`: Summary metrics by country
- `model_rating_coeffs.csv`: Coefficients from rating model
- `rating_by_country.png`: Visual of average ratings by country.
